# Research question
**Which attributes best predict breast cancer malignancy?**

```{r}
# Read data and set column 
data <- read.csv("breast-cancer-wisconsin.data", na.strings = '?')
colnames(data) <- c("id", "Clump Thickness", "Cell Size Uniformity", "Cell Shape Uniformity",                        "Marginal Adhesion", "Single Epithelial Cell Size", "Bare Nuclei",
                    "Bland Chromatin", "Normal Nucleoli", "Mitoses", "Class")
```


```{r}
# Look at head of data
head(data, 10)

# Summarize data
summary(data)

```
